body:
## Release Notes

- Add release-drafter github action. @iphydf (#43)
- Use flutter redux for state management. @iphydf (#42)
- Upgrade to latest sdk and dep versions. @iphydf (#41)
- Update github actions. @iphydf (#40)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#39)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#38)
- Use non-privileged build user `builder` for webtox build. @iphydf (#37)
- Pin flutter in the Netlify build @robinlinden (#35)
- Update flutter, dart, and dependencies @robinlinden (#34)

## Features

- Add localization. @iphydf (#45)
- Start keeping messages in the database @robinlinden (#24)
- Add state and the ability to set the nick and status message @JFreegman (#19)
- Set up a database and contact persistence. @robinlinden (#20)
- add drawer menu and skeleton settings/profile pages @JFreegman (#17)
- Add an add contact page @robinlinden (#16)
- Add bootstrap node behind websocket on heroku. @iphydf (#9)

## Performance improvements

- [ImgBot] Optimize images @imgbot (#1)

## Bug Fixes

- Fix add-contact page being unusable with smaller viewports @robinlinden (#26)
- Fix that the contact name on the chat page never gets updated @robinlinden (#25)

## Documentation

- Update the readme with build instructions @robinlinden (#31)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Upload build artifacts on CI. @iphydf (#46)
- Update to latest ios/macos recommendations. @iphydf (#44)
- Target Flutter 3 @robinlinden (#30)
- Target flutter 2.10.3 @robinlinden (#28)
- Measure code coverage @robinlinden (#27)
- Bump dependencies, update what we target in CI @robinlinden (#23)
- Fix Flutter 2.10 build, target it in CI @robinlinden (#18)
- Fix heroku build for real. @iphydf (#13)
- Fix heroku build. @iphydf (#12)
- Use flutter-web image and add heroku build to CI. @iphydf (#11)
- Add BUILD file and associated tests. @iphydf (#5)
- Set the right port when launching on heroku. @iphydf (#4)
- Add web dockerfile and heroku config. @iphydf (#3)
- Add github settings for CI required checks. @iphydf (#2)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- Split out the add contact page into separate widgets. @iphydf (#47)
- Remove websockify from this repo. @iphydf (#22)
- Split main.dart into logical chunks @robinlinden (#7)
name: v0.1.0
